Mugen Souls features a free-roaming battle map, turn-based combat, and
massive amounts of customization and growth to maximize the fun players can
have with the game.


Expansive worlds to explore: Travel freely on each world to explore and
find treasures and items. Monsters are roaming about, so be cautious, or
fight them head-on and make them your subservient peons!
